title: Strawberry Lipstick
description: Gabe needs to travel to Detroit for an interview and live appearance with Forgotten Legacy.In the aftermath of the events in Tattooed Memories, Harper isn't ready to travel, so stays at home. So Gabe, in typical Gabe fashion, finds a way for them both to have fun from different parts of the country.Strawberry Lipstick was originally available in the Good Vibes anthology.This short should be read after Tattooed Memories to get a full insight into the dynamic of Gabe and Harper.
author: L. Ann
